content:
IRecommendedElasticPoolMetric Interface

Definition

An immutable client-side representation of an Azure SQL Replication link.

In this Article

public interface IRecommendedElasticPoolMetric : Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.IHasInner<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql.Fluent.Models.RecommendedElasticPoolMetric>

Properties

DateTimeProperty

Gets the time of metric (ISO8601 format).
Dtu

Gets the DTUs (Database Transaction Units) See https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/sql-database-what-is-a-dtu/.
SizeGB

Gets the size in gigabytes.
